ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Second Coming" Part 3 of 3. Slipping dangerously deeper into the identity of Paul James - the supposed New Messiah - Chance promises to raise the dead before a TV audience. But with a vengeful father and church elders scheming in the shadows, will people be witnessing a miracle or a martyrdom?
The conclusion to the second coming. Christopher Chance slips dangerously deeper into the identity of "The New Messiah" Paul James. Chance promised to raise the dead, can he?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/human-target-16-the-second-coming-part-3-pieces-of/4000-99519/
ComicInfo.Title: The Second Coming Conclusion: Pieces of Lead
